captions.text:
-(SINGING) It's a cold
and crazy world

But baby, me and all my girls
are bringing on the fire.

Show a little leg, got
to shimmy your chest.

It's a life, it's a style,
it's a need.

E-X-P-R-E-S-S. Love, sex,
ladies, no regrets.

Been holding back for
quite sometime.

Step into the fantasy, you'll
never wanna leave, baby that's

It'll move you, going through
you, so do what I do.
All ladies come to flaunt it.

Boys, throw it up
if you want it.

comments.text:
@GirlOfBroadway Well...My mom forced me to watch (am a guy) and...kinda 
liked it. wasnt expecting much but DAMN i particularly liked the vaudeville 
esque dances. But as a guy, kinda awkward as you said (that scene where 
Christina & the bartender dude get caught humpin each other by the duds

to watch this movie, then yer mum shouldnt be lecturing you on what to 
watch LOL

comments.text:
WOW people are sooooo stupid. Liza Minnelli was wonderful in Cabaret and it 
was tastefully done for it's time...40 years ago people. Burlesque is an 
amazing tribute that has revived a movie like Cabaret and CHRISTINA 
AGUILERA WAS AMAZINGGGGG in Burlesque. She knocked it sooooo far outa the 
park...I can't get enough of it. It's so naughty, but still tasteful and 
glamorous. A voice and talent like Christina's should be enjoyed. Stop with 
the "she's copying" bullshit...people are such haters!
comments.author: princess818xoxo
